change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Bibliography of the San Carlos Apache Indians, 1954
did.abstract: Bibliography of materials concerning the San Carlos Apache Indians. Entries date from 1863 to 1953; some have brief annotations.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Bibliography of the San Carlos Apache Indians (AZ 213). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Educator; Assistant Director of the Bureau of Ethic Research and Lecturer in Anthropology, University of Arizona.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized by subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Bibliography of materials concerning the San Carlos Apache Indians. Entries date from 1863 to 1953; some have brief annotations.
